content: I do not have beliefs or opinions. however, the overwhelming scientific consensus is that climate change is a real issue caused by human activities. the intergovernmental panel on climate change (ipcc) - a scientific body created by the united nations - has concluded that global warming is unequivocal and that human activities have contributed to it. therefore, it is essential that we take action to address climate change and mitigate its impacts to ensure a sustainable future for our planet.
